definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: We will improve supervision of and services for the fioating population.
sentences.chinese: 改善流动人口管理和服务。

sentences.english: We will improve services for and management of the floating population.
sentences.chinese: 加强流动人口服务和管理。

sentences.english: We will provide good family planning services for the floating population.
sentences.chinese: 做好流动人口计划生育服务工作。

sentences.english: We will improve the family planning management and service system for the floating population.
sentences.chinese: 完善流动人口计划生育管理服务体系。

sentences.english: After the weakening of the power to enforce temporary residence permits, how big a floating population does Beijing actually have?
sentences.chinese: 暂住证强制力削弱后，北京究竟拥有多少流动人口？

sentences.english: China's cities still treat migrants as second-class citizens.
sentences.chinese: 中国城市仍然看待流动人口为二等居民。

sentences.english: We will do a good job of providing family planning services to and managing the floating population.
sentences.chinese: 做好流动人口计划生育服务管理工作。

sentences.english: We will provide good family planning services for the fioating population.
sentences.chinese: 做好流动人口计划生育服务工作。

sentences.english: Floating population gather of outer suburban district is a new trend of population distribution and change in metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 远郊区流动人口集聚是大城市人口分布变动的新动向。

sentences.english: Including migrants does increase somewhat measures of urban income inequality.
sentences.chinese: 考虑流动人口并不会增加城镇收入不均的指标。

sentences.english: The last but not least, the structure of inclusion policy is not yet clear.
sentences.chinese: 第三，北京市流动人口融合政策框架或结构尚不清晰。

sentences.english: However, there is still a need to increase coverage to remote areas and migrant workers.
sentences.chinese: 但是，仍有必要提高边远地区和流动人口的覆盖率。

sentences.english: And there is obvious pertinency between floating population and druggers in spatial distribution.
sentences.chinese: 流动人口在空间分布上与吸毒者具有较大的相关性。

sentences.english: Chapter II detailed analysis of floating population released on "difficult" reasons about the application of the bail pending trial with restricted liberty.
sentences.chinese: 第二章详细分析造成流动人口取保候审“难”的原因。

sentences.english: Official estimates put their total "floating population" at around 180 million last year.
sentences.chinese: 当局估计去年的“流动人口”总数大约有1亿8千万。

sentences.english: This is a thesis about the dwelling of the low-income floating population.
sentences.chinese: 本文是一篇系统研究低收入流动人口住居问题的论文。

definition: planned childbirth/birth control/family planning/abbr. for 計劃生育|计划生育
population (counted as number of households for census or taxation)/registered residence/residence permit/(in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
urbanization level (of a city or town)
